definitions.definition: To climb up or lower oneself down a mast, tree, rope, or the like, by embracing it alternately with the arms and legs, without help of steps, spurs, or the like.
To run about borrowing money hastily and temporarily, as when trying to make a payment .

main_definition: To climb up or lower oneself down a mast, tree, rope, or the like, by embracing it alternately with the arms and legs, without help of steps, spurs, or the like.
secondary_definitions: ( US , slang ) To run about borrowing money hastily and temporarily, as when trying to make a payment .
